abstracts.cdata!:
The Preparation of Metropolitan
            Development Programs for the Fortaleza and Salvador Projects
            will include the following components: (a) institutional
            development, which will include detailed investment and
            engineering studies, technical assistance in financial
            economic analysis for project preparation, and
            administrative and financial management; income and
            employment generation studies and pilot programs (b) pilot
            civil works which will include alternative technologies,
            institutional arrangements, and an integrated approach in
            urban development. The components were chosen in sectors of
            activity where large-scale investment projects will be
            selected: upgrading and providing urban services (water
            supply, sanitation, garbage collection); urban
            infrastructure (industrial sites, transport); income and
            employment generation programs; and institutional
            development. In addition, the pilot civil works are an
            integral part of the preparation of the feasibility studies.
            Test methods, technologies, and institutional arrangements
            will be used to execute more important civil works investments.
